sentences.sContent: The sect, which broke from the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints more than a century ago, believes polygamy brings glorification in heaven.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sect, which broke from the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints more than a century ago, believes polygamy brings glorification in heaven.
sentences.sCn: 这个教派，原本是一个多世纪以前从摩门教末世圣徒教会分离出来的，相信一夫多妻制可以升上天堂。

remMethod.val: poly(多) + gam(婚姻) + y → 一夫多妻制， 一妻多夫制

words.tran: 一夫多妻的；一妻多夫的
一夫多妻的；[植] 多花柱的；多雌蕊的
多配偶的人；多配偶论者
主张一夫多妻制者；多妻的男子

trans.tranCn: 一夫多妻制， 一妻多夫制， 多配偶制
trans.tranOther: the practice of having more than one husband or wife at the same time
